Docs.summary: Indicates that the implementer wants to be a lifetime lease sponsor.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An object must implement the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor> interface if it needs to request a lease renewal for a particular object. An object that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor> interface can become a sponsor by registering itself with the lease manager. The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ISponsor> interface is used by the lifetime service to call back to the sponsor.
